website_summaries.verdict: This set is ideal for youngsters ages 6 to 12, and comes at a mid-range price. The Cinderella theme is a classic that will never lose popularity among kids and collectors.
pros: Fans of the Disney classic Cinderella will love this castle's intricate details, pretty design, and variety of accessories that relate to the beloved animated movie
Has many moving parts and a few fun surprises, including moving fireplace and dance floor
cons: A few of the pieces are surprisingly small, and challenging for little hands to put into place

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 9 year old daughter. She loved it and started building as soon as she opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but hard for a small child to do.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old daughter and it is far too many little pieces and a thick book looks like a huge manual... to assemble the castle. She got frustrated so fast trying to put all the little pieces together. Some are so small they’re like a grain of rice! Def not for the age recommended on the box. I’d say this is more for 9year and up... don’t buy it unless you plan to help your kid do it all! Is hard !!
customer_reviews.author: A. B. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great directions
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful castle & it was easy enough for my seven year old granddaughter to build with very little help. The directions are simple & easy to follow. Complaint: so many tiny pieces that have nothing to do with the actual castle, making the piece count a bit deceiving
customer_reviews.author: carpentress

customer_reviews.title: Small pieces monitor your child/children
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 6 yr old niece! She loves father-daughter time and putting together legos with her daddy! This was the perfect gift for her birthday!
customer_reviews.author: MBGH

customer_reviews.title: If you have a LEGO loving kid, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 7 year olds birthday, she had it built in two days.. she felt so accomplished when she was finished so it was totally worth the money. It’s a good size and has a lot of cute details.. it’s been 3 months and she still plays with it. Awesome project for any kid.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Fun &
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter had tears of happiness in her eyes when she opened her Birthday gift. We were so happy that she loved and enjoyed playing and creating her castle. We spend lovely quality time together and those are the first Lego’s she pulls out when she comes to stay with us. The Princess carriage, and all other Princesses editions we either bought or will buy for Christmas. This way she has the main Castle and all of the Disney Princesses and their specialty homes. Ex: We bought Ariel with her underwater carriage, Alladin will be for Christmas and so on. A “must buy” if you want a high quality, creative, educational, and fun toy!!!
customer_reviews.author: G2G

customer_reviews.title: Nice and fun LEGO castle
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter’s birthday, she was so happy, and we build it together. The instruction is very clear and easy to understand, for kids is also easy to read and build it. The castle has a lot of detail and surprise in it as LEGO always make a very good product. Since this the a Disney theme, so the price is slightly higher compare with other LEGO. But overall it’s a nice product and I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty set. Since the sections are made to switch ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty set. Since the sections are made to switch out, they can come loose pretty easy, but overall a nice set. Lots of fun details.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: LEGO is LEGO - great designs and lots of fun. Unfortunately, our box came with a missing bag #2, and my 6yo refused to wait another week for a reorder. It was a 100-days of school gift (which is a big thing at her school), and she was super excited to get it. Lots of frustration and crying that we can’t make it like on the picture because of the missing pieces but refused to keep it unopen and send back. Overall, the product is great but our experience could’ve been better
customer_reviews.author: Tetyana Dudka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cousin loved this. She loves legos and Disney, we couldn’t miss with this present!
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good princess lego set
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it. She played with it for some days in a row and I still see her playing with it now and again weeks later. Also, I can add it to our growing lego collection. Front side has curb appeal. Back side allows doll house type play.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build for a 5 year - great attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: Awesome LEGO set! My 5 year old daughter is all about Disney princesses and this castle is her favorite of the princess castles she has. Excellent attention to detail and fun activity to share bonding time with your child. Great set!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome LEGO set. My 6yr old wanted this castle and built easily with my supervision. Instructions are easy to follow. Beautiful when completed and came with spare parts we are keeping in the original box. Amazing gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lpo

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas Gift for a 10 yr old girl...she loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old gr. daughter loved this set and put it together in one day! What is nice once the set is put together it is a doll house she can play with...it is very pretty too!

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely love it. It is decent size and very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sister for her birthday. She absolutely love it. It is decent size and very pretty. There are many rooms that jas hidden chest

customer_reviews.title: Received a previously opened package of Cinderella's Dream Castle Lego set
customer_reviews.text: We received a previously opened package of Cinderella's Dream Castle Lego set. The 3 pieces of tape on the box were all open and the 585 pieces had been removed from the multiple bags they were originally in and put in one large Ziploc bag, which was obviously used. The set was missing pieces and the instructions had obviously been used. We plan to return this set, but were very disappointed in this oversight. We are huge Lego fans, so we know the Lego set itself will be top notch!
customer_reviews.author: pizzazz

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old granddaughter loves this set. The mystery door and clock are her favorites. The set has lots of detail. She loves princesses so this was perfect. It took her a little while to put it together but she has played with it every day!

product_meta.title: LEGO Disney Princess Cinderella’s Dream Castle 41154 Popular Construction Toy for Kids (585 Pieces)
product_meta.description: LEGO Disney Cinderella dream castle is the ultimate set to play out your fairy-tales, whether recreating scenes from Disney Cinderella or creating new stories of your own. With a grand dining room, bedroom, dressing area, kitchen, fireplace and balcony, there is so much to explore and hidden secrets to discover in this popular toy for kids. Get creative using the modular design to easily move and swap sections within the model, or rearrange the rooms of the castle and integrate them with other compatible LEGO Disney toys to build your own dream creations. Includes 2 mini-doll figures plus a foal and 2 mice figures.
feature_bullets: Build this LEGO Disney Cinderella building toy castle playset featuring a 3-story castle with secret hiding places, dining area, bedroom, balcony with revolving dancefloor, kitchen, lounge, outside area and horse cart
This Disney castle includes 5 LEGO figures to play out scenes from the Disney’s Cinderella movie: a Cinderella mini-doll figure, Prince Charming mini-doll figure, a foal and 2 mice
585 pieces – Disney toy construction set for boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 12 years
LEGO Disney building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Cinderella castle measures over 13-inch (34cm) high, 9-inch (25cm) wide and 4-inch (12cm) deep Cart (without horse) measures over 1-inch (4cm) high, 3-inch (9cm) long and 1-inch (5cm) wide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars668 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
